com.flamingOctoIronman.eventFramework

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.eventFramework.Event
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreEvent, InputEvent

    public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the framework for all events. It provides methods to subscribe, unsubscribe, and publish events.
    Author:
    Quint
    See Also:
    CoreEvent

             throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Publishes the event to all subscribers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - This should never be thrown

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(java.lang.Object subscriber)
        Removes the object from the list of subscribers; the object will not get notified when the event is published.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - Object to unsubscribe from the event

      • compareNames

        public abstract boolean compareNames(java.lang.reflect.Method m)
        Compares the name of the class to the annotation on the passed method.
        Parameters:
        m - The method to compare
        Returns:
        True if the name of the class is the same as the method's annotation, otherwise false
